verses.text: Blessed is* every one that feareth the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**; that walketh in his ways.
For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt* thou be*, and it shall be* well with thee.
Thy wife shall be* as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**.
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
Yea, thou shalt see thy childrenâ€™s children, and* peace upon Israel.
